title: Chevrolet Trailblazer Finally Launched in India at INR 26.40 Lacs
text: Chevrolet Trailblazer Finally Launched in India at INR 26.40 Lacs 21st, Oct 2015 3:30 PM View: 2 0 General Motors has finally launched the much awaited SUV named Chevrolet Trailblazer in the Indian car market at the starting price of INR 26.40 Lacs . The bookings for the same have also commenced on the famous shopping portal Amazon , from today. This all new model will be brought to the Indian boundaries in the form of CKD kits. These kits will then be assembled at company's facility located in Gujarat. As per an official statement made by GM India President & MD, Mr Arvind Saxena, “The Trailblazer is Chevrolet's toughest yet most refined SUV, offering premium ride and handling dynamics.” Read on: Chevrolet Trailblazer Bookings Talking about the dimensions, it measures 4878 mm long, 2132 mm wide, 1851 mm tall and carries a wheelbase of 2845 mm. It stands on 6-spoke, 18-inch alloy wheels packed with 265/60 R18 tubeless tyres. The front fascia on the exterior portion is adorned with a wide grille dissected with the Chevrolet emblem in between. Details on: Chevrolet Models in India This vehicle looks quite muscular and makes use of projector headlamps, integrated with LED daytime running lights. There is chrome surrounding on the portions of grille and fog lamp enclosures. The cabin gets a 7-inch MyLink touchscreen infotainment, that is compatible with Android and iOS. For safety, there are numerous important components including the likes of ABS, EBD, reverse camera with LCD monitor, cornering brake control, LED brake lights, ESP and dual airbags. Moving on to the engine specifications, the hood is packed with a 2.8 litre, four-cylinder diesel motor that efficiently develops 200Bhp of power at 3600rpm and 500Nm torque at 2000rpm. For transmission, there is a six-speed automatic transmission facility that is further linked to an RWD mechanism.
